Canyon Facts


Location:

Tech Level:

Rating follows the French Canyon Rating system and is composed of three properties: Verticality (represented by the letter V), Aquatic (represented by the letter A) and Committment (represented by a Roman numeral). For the V and A properties, the scale runs from 1 to 7, signifying an increase in difficulty; Committment is rated from I-VI, also increasing in difficulty. Click for more info.
